text:
@SecPompeo #Balochistan under Iranian occupation and Pakistani control,  facing #CoronaVirus as border between Iran and Pakistan is based on Baloch population.

USA needs to immediately consult with  #Baloch leadership @hyrbyair_marri to take appropriate measures to fight the epidemic.
